items.sentence: It\'s been three months since I moved to Boston.
There\'s a fountain in the middle of the garden.
That doesn\'t really seem appropriate right now.
That doesn\'t sound like something Tom would do.
Aren\'t you doing anything special this evening?
Aren\'t you going to go swimming this afternoon?
Tom always walks to school if it isn\'t raining.
This week has been terribly busy for both of us.
Three people died in a fire in Boston on Monday.
Have you already decided what to do next Monday?
How many Christmas carols can you sing by heart?
I need to tell Tom that Mary is in the hospital.
Tom believes that the stars control our futures.
Tom and his brothers grew up in the Boston area.
Tom and his cousins went into business together.
Tom has never been to a French-speaking country.
Tom had never realized just how lovely Mary was.
That isn\'t a risk that I\'d be willing to take.
Tom asked Mary when she was planning to go home.
Tom asked me if I knew anybody living in Boston.
